articles.title: Leader of South African Communist Party to Boost Its Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Leader of South African Communist Party to Boost Its Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), who is leading a delegation of the WPK participating in the 14th Congress of the South African Communist Party, had a talk with Blade Nzimande, general secretary of the Central Committee of the South African Communist Party, on Tuesday.
					 The general secretary said that Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK and the supreme leader of the Korean people, personally dispatched the delegation of the WPK to the 14th Congress of the South African Communist Party when the leadership of the South African Communist Party and all its members are in difficulties due to the maneuvers of the domestic reactionaries, adding this is a great inspiration to them.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the relations between the two parties have long-standing, he stressed that the South African Communist Party would further develop the friendly relationship with the WPK in the future, too.

articles.title: Art Performance in Celebration of Hwasong-14 Given
articles.content:
Art Performance in Celebration of Hwasong-14 Given
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given here in celebration of the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 from Monday to Wednesday.
					 Put on the stage were colorful pieces such as male chorus "Glory to Our Great Party", male solo and chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" and female chorus "Song of Hwasong Artillery Piece". 
					
					 In light music "March of Rocket Artillerymen of the Republic" the performers highly praised President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for laying the foundation of self-reliant national defence industry from scratch and providing strong base for the development of the Juche-oriented rocket industry under the unfurled banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 Song and dance "Make Others Envy Us", dance "Dash ahead toward Future" and other numbers showed the revolutionary will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to bring about a great leap forward and ceaseless innovations in the Mallima drive for great upswing to carry out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, keeping in mind the national honor and pride of living in the country with the strongest ICBM.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience as it created a new depiction of music by combining Korean-style orchestra, light music, chorus and diverse vocal pieces and dances.

articles.title: Workers and Trade Union Members Hail Successful Test-Launch of ICBM
articles.content:
Workers and Trade Union Members Hail Successful Test-Launch of ICBM
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Workers and trade union members held a meeting at the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site Wednesday to celebrate the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 Prior to the meeting, they placed bouquets at the mosaic of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that the successful test-launch was a striking demonstration of the heroic stamina of the powerful Paektusan nation and the exhaustible national power and represented the great victory that dealt merciless blows at the enemies making desperate efforts to prevent the dynamic advance of the DPRK.
					
					 They said that the great victory is the precious fruition of the shining feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who designated the site for the first ordnance factory in the liberated country, led the untrodden path of munitions industry and provided the powerful war deterrent and the ceaseless devoted efforts made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who opened the way of developing new-type rockets in order to firmly defend the country's dignity and sovereignty.  
					
					 They extended warm congratulations to the scientists in the field of defence science who put the defence capabilities on the highest phase through their painstaking practice. They called upon the workers and trade union members to push ahead with the great advance of Mallima for carrying out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with the death-defying will.

articles.title: Many Poems Produced to Hail Successful ICBM Test in DPRK
articles.content:
Many Poems Produced to Hail Successful ICBM Test in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Poets of the DPRK have written many poems hailing the success of an ICBM test, upon hearing the news about it.
					 In two days after the special report on the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14, they wrote dozens of poems.
					
					 The poems reflect the Korean people's reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who advanced an idea on building a Juche-based rocket force and laid an eternal foundation for developing the self-supporting defence industry.
					
					 They also highly praise respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for turning the country into a power with ICBM.
					
					 Among the poems are "Long Live Invincible Power!", "Earth Is Eternally Beautiful" and "At Plaza of War Victory."

articles.title: Day of Sea Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Sea Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- July 12 is the Day of Sea in the DPRK.
					 On this occasion, such diverse activities have been carried out across the country as marine scientific and technological presentation and show, film show on marine exploration and development and the collection and protection of marine fauna and flora.
					
					 In this regard Kwak Il Hwan, secretary of the DPRK Marine Society, told KCNA:
					
					 The marine sector takes a big share in developing the national economy. Therefore, the development of marine science and technology and exploitation of marine resources are of great significance in prospering the country and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 The DPRK has modern marine scientific research units and educational institutions and has laid a solid foundation for developing marine industry.
					
					 Meanwhile, maritime sports and cultural activities are encouraged among people to love the sea and deepen knowledge about it.

articles.title: State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
State Academy of Sciences
Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK is a powerful organ for scientific research guidance, which steers the country's sci-tech development and supports the socialist construction as required by the age of knowledge-based economy.
					 Its scientists and technicians recently made a number of successes in their drive for giving a strong scientific and technological impetus to the development of the national economy.
					
					 The Manufactory No. 111 introduced into several fishery stations the IT-based and smart system for checking the freshness of fish and consigning, thus opening up a bright prospect for supplying people with fresh fish all the year around.
					
					 The Paper Engineering Institute improved the performance of synthetic fiber filter and manufactured a drill necessary for the production of precision filter tip.
					
					 The Central Mining Research Institute produced over 40 pneumatic flotation machines necessary for upgrading the ore-dressing process at the dressing plant No.3 under the Komdok Mining Complex.
					
					 The Ferrous Mining Research Institute gave a helping hand to the construction of a wet concentration plant in the Jaeryong Mine and installed the drum separator at the plant.
					
					 Meanwhile, many urgent sci-tech problems have been solved by the Mechanical Engineering Institute, Power-driven Machine Institute, Microbiological Research Institute and other institutes under the academy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snipes at Trump's Outbursts against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snipes at Trump's Outbursts against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Trump recently talked rubbish that the U.S. has been "exposed to a threat from a reckless and cruel regime," crying out for "taking decisive counteraction."
					 Asserting that the U.S. will never acknowledge the nukes of the DPRK and its threat, Trump said that what remains to be done for the U.S. is to prepare well all options including the use of power.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 It is tragedy that Trump has not yet dropped his "theory of all-powerful strength" although it can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 It is a wild dream that can never come true for the U.S. to browbeat the DPRK through military pressure, sanctions and blockade.
					
					 The Korean people have always been exposed to military threat and sanctions by the U.S.
					
					 But they have never felt frustration or despair.
					
					 On the contrary, they have advanced straight on the road of building a powerful socialist country only, creating epochal miracles with self-development as a great engine.
					
					 The ever-escalating military threat, sanctions and blockade by the U.S. have accelerated the advance of the DPRK and made its people stronger only.
					
					 No matter what others may say, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will never flinch from the road of independence, Songun and socialism and the DPRK will creditably protect peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region as a full-fledged nuclear power.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Actions against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Actions against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. Department of Defense advertised that it made a military attack scenario at the instruction of Trump to prepare diverse countermeasures for coping with "provocation by north Korea".
					 Meanwhile, Trump told the south Korean chief executive during his visit to the U.S. that the era of "strategic patience" policy toward "north Korea" was over and that the U.S. had a very strong and definite scenario.
					
					 This is the last-ditch efforts of those who were frightened by the invincible national power and the strategic position of the DPRK on a new stage, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. should know that it is as foolish as strangling its own windpipe when carrying out its scenario of military attack against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should neither overlook nor misjudge the fact that its mainland and the Pacific operation area are within the range of the strike of the DPRK and it has powerful means capable of dealing deadly retaliatory blows at the aggressors.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, which are fanning up military provocations against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. master while dancing to the tune of it, should behave themselves after facing up to the reality.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers should not run amuck, clearly understanding that their reckless acts would only invite miserable disasters.

articles.title: U.S. Anachronistic Policy towards DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Anachronistic Policy towards DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Wednesday warns in a commentary that the Trump administration will never settle the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula with its anachronistic policy towards the DPRK but further endanger the U.S.
					 The commentary refers to the fact that former high-ranking officials and experts on the Korean affairs in the U.S. and other countries are expressing their strong doubts about the Trump administration's policy towards the DPRK and urging it to correct its policy, though belatedly.
					
					 Nearly six months have passed since the Trump administration appeared but it is now faced with the serious political crisis. This is attributable to its persistent, arrogant and self-righteous way of thinking, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 When the Trump administration emerged, many analysts and experts on the Korean affairs in the world strongly urged it to be prudent in shaping its policy towards the DPRK and not to follow its preceding administrations' failures.
					
					 However, it made a great political mistake of applying the old way of thinking in which it handles international issues with strength to the settlement of the Korean affairs while talking about "peace by strength", far from making sincere efforts to draw a lesson in the past.
					
					 As a result, the U.S. strategy for stifling the DPRK only resulted in ranking itself among nuclear powers.
					
					 The Trump administration would be well advised to make a switchover in shaping its policy towards the DPRK, though belatedly, rather than following the dangerous road of inviting miserable consequences, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Pushing Situation on Korean Peninsula to Brink of War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Pushing Situation on Korean Peninsula to Brink of War 
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities groundlessly hurt the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense making rapid progress and steadily introduce nuclear war equipment under the pretext of it, pushing the situation to the brink of a war, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for spawning the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula by introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense serves as a treasured sword for justice firmly guaranteeing the nation's sovereignty and right to existence in defiance of the increased nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the U.S. could flout the destiny of the Korean nation and trample down peace on the Korean peninsula as it pleased through its unilateral nuclear threat and blackmail. If a war breaks out on the peninsula, such land as the U.S. can never be safe.
					
					 The DPRK is ready for peaceful or non-peaceful means, but it does not want the country to suffer a war and the whole nation to meet the disaster of a war again. Therefore, it strives hard to exercise utmost patience for peaceful reunification. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, if the south Korean authorities misjudge the DPRK's will to achieve peace and reunification and steadily rush headlong into criminal moves to hurt the latter's sovereignty and right to existence in collusion with outside forces, they will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences. 
					
					 The mission of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence remains unchanged until the U.S. imperialist aggressors withdraw from south Korea, taking all lethal weapons with them, and a danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula is brought to a definite end.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Reckless Remarks of Hong Yong Phyo
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Reckless Remarks of Hong Yong Phyo
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Heinous confrontation maniac Hong Yong Phyo, while stepping down from his office, stressed the need to continue putting pressure and sanctions against the north, faulting the DPRK's bolstering nuclear force as "provocation". Furthermore, he asserted that he made every possible effort to lay foundation of peace and unification during his office.
					 This is nothing but a cynical ploy to lay the blame for breaking the north-south relations with traitor Park Geun Hye during his office at the door of the DPRK, Minju Joson Wednesday says, and goes on:
					
					 It is also a revelation of the wicked intention to justify the policy of Park Geun Hye group for confrontation with the compatriots and to check the present south Korean authorities mulling improving the north-south relations.
					
					 Although Hong Yong Phyo spat out all kinds of sophism to cover up traitorous acts against reunification, he further revealed his true colors as treacherous confrontation maniac and would precipitate his destruction as he is more dead than alive.
					
					 Hong is the traitor for all ages and the root of evils of the nation who should be buried in the cemetery of the history together with Park Geun Hye as early as possible. Severe punishment of the history and mindset of the people await traitor Hong.

articles.title: U.S. Should Think Twice about Its Military Option against DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Should Think Twice about Its Military Option against DPRK: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is resorting to foolhardy military gambling.
					 The U.S. Department of Defense is noisily trumpeting that it has mapped out a scenario for attack on the DPRK at the instruction of Trump.
					
					 Trump is also not hiding the scenario for military attack, asserting "the era of strategic patience with north Korea is over" and "the U.S. has a strong and definite scenario against it".
					
					 Stunned by the DPRK's great success in an ICBM test-launch, the U.S. staged a joint ballistic missile firing demonstration with the south Korean warmongers, let its B-1Bs fly into the sky above the Korean peninsula to stage a bomb-dropping drill. Trump formally approved the replacement of the launching tubes for Tomahawk cruise missiles of Virginia-class subs to increase their ground attack capability by more than three times. The subs will be used as major strategic weapons for attack on the DPRK.
					
					 This is just a last-ditch effort of the U.S., extremely frightened by the tremendous national strength and strategic position of the DPRK that has been put on a new level. It proves that the present U.S. administration's moves hostile to the DPRK have reached an extremely dangerous phase.
					
					 The Trump administration, which once asserted that military option had been excluded from its "maximum pressure and engagement" policy, is now openly crying out for "mounting a military attack" on the DPRK. This shows that the U.S. desperately seeks to realize its wild ambition for igniting a war against the DPRK through a sudden preemptive attack.
					
					 The U.S. is now accusing the DPRK of going beyond the "red line," resorting to foolhardy military provocations. But it is just the U.S. which has actually passed the red line.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are fully ready to counter any reckless military option of the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. has prepared a military attack plan for neutralizing the DPRK by force, the DPRK has also its own plan for military counteraction, the plan for reducing the U.S. into ashes.
					
					 The U.S. last-ditch nuclear war gambling will only precipitate the worst-ever disaster in which its mainland will turn into ashes.
					
					 The fate of the U.S. will become tragic from the moment it puts its military option into practice.
					
					 It is also ridiculous that the south Korean authorities are busy hiding their master's sinister plan for a preemptive attack, talking about "dialogue" and "leading role."
					
					 The U.S. administration had better pay heed to the public claims terming the preemptive attack plan unrealistic and urging it to correct its hysteric stance on the DPRK, and think twice about this.

articles.title: South Koreans Demand Release of Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
South Koreans Demand Release of Prisoners of Conscience
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A public candlelight rally took place at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul, south Korea on July 8 demanding release of prisoners of conscience, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					Attending the rally, sponsored by the Committee for Accelerating the Release of Prisoners of Conscience, were more than 2,000 citizens.
					
					 Speakers there deplored that those of conscience who were jailed by the dictatorial regime are still in prison despite the regime change.
					
					 They urged the regime to release all prisoners of conscience who were imprisoned after struggling for workers and masses.
					
					 Meanwhile, there were a signature campaign and demonstration near the Sejong Culture Hall.

articles.title: S. Korean Women Call for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Women Call for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Women's Solidarity of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on July 8 on the lapse of ten years since its formation.
					 Members from civic and social bodies including the Confederation of Trade Unions, Federation of Peasants Associations and Women Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration took part in it.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said the women's solidarity has taken the lead in the struggle for the emancipation of women and popular masses, peace against war and for independent reunification.
					
					 The movement for reunification was faced with difficulties and ordeals due to the former conservative regime but the public candlelight actions are ushering in a new era, they said.
					
					 They called on the women to take the lead in the struggle for ushering in the era of independent reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Coal Miners Demand Compensation for Losses
articles.content:
S. Korean Coal Miners Demand Compensation for Losses
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean coal miners who suffered damages under the worst conditions held a press conference in Seoul on July 7, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of Seoul.
					 The speakers denounced the "Labor Welfare Public Entity" for denying compensation, far from making apology and reparation for banning exercise of right to claims for losses owing to the wrong rules for several decades. 
					
					 They urged the "Labor Welfare Public Entity" to stop at once abuse of power and make compensation for losses.

articles.title: Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Athletics of Koreans in Japan Formed
articles.content:
Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Athletics of Koreans in Japan Formed
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A general meeting related to the formation of the Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Athletics of Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Commercial Workers Hall in Tokyo on July 1. 
					 At the meeting, the speakers stressed need to rally compatriots through athletics. 
					
					 Kang Jun Song was elected chairman of the association.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia published in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on June 28 on the occasion of the first anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- World media reported special write-ups from June 16 to 24 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					  The Lao papers Vatelao and Vientiane Mai carried special write-ups titled "Immortal feats of Kim Jong Il", illustrated with portraits of his smiling image.
					
					 The papers said that history has seen not a few great persons who committed to the progressive development of humankind but none of them is on a par with Kim Jong Il as he performed titanic feats for accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Arpan and the websites of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association also carried articles praising the history of Kim Jong Il's party leadership, illustrated with portraits of his smiling image.
					
					 India's newspaper World's Mirror carried an article illustrated his photo. The article praised him for developing the WPK into an ever-victorious party that is ideologically pure and organizationally integrated, and united in action.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age in an article titled "Image of a great man" praised the noble outlooks on the people and life by Kim Jong Il who lived his life as simple, always finding himself among the people.
					
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Baath, the AKP and the State Radio Broadcasting of Cambodia and the websites of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany reported in detail the noble revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to strengthening the WPK and triumphantly advancing the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Nigerian Figure Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Nigerian Figure Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, visited the DPRK Embassy in Lagos on June 28 on the occasion of the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The chairman placed a bunch of flowers at the art works depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid homage to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, sent a bunch of flowers to the DPRK embassy on June 29.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows, Book and Photo Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows, Book and Photo Exhibitions Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows and book and photo exhibitions took place in Germany, Nigeria, Algeria and South Africa on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were books and photos showing the achievements made by the service members and civilians of the DPRK in building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Korean films "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun" and "Okryu Children's Hospital" were shown.
					
					  The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that Kim Jong Il's love for the people and the younger generations are embodied in the popular policies of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), adding:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is leading the Party to brilliant victory true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The world is envying the Korean people who have defended the country and created happiness for themselves under the leadership of the WPK despite the severe sanctions by the U.S. and the West.
					
					 So long as the WPK is under the leadership of the great leader and has the correct guiding ideology and excellent army and people, the Party will always emerge victorious.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Niger State government of Nigeria praise Kim Jong Il for strengthening the WPK into a party loyal to the people and an ever-victorious party.

articles.title: Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Marked by DR Congo Body
articles.content:
Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Marked by DR Congo Body
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association issued a statement on June 27 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
					 The statement said that President Kim Il Sung clarified the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- which serves as a basis for the settlement of the issue of the reunification.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities denied the three principles of national reunification set forth in the July 4 joint statement, drove the inter-Korean ties to the lowest ebb, yielding to the demand of foreign forces and are going reckless in the anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should draw a lesson from the end of the predecessor who incited the confrontation pursuant to the moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK and should join it in its consistent struggle to pave a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 They should not take part in the moves of foreign forces to unleash a nuclear war while pulling up the fellow countrymen in the north over its measures to bolster up the nuclear force.
					
					 We fully support the just struggle of the Korean people for achieving the independent reunification of the country under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Blade Nzimande expone voluntad de ampliar relaciones de amistad con el PTC
articles.content:
Blade Nzimande expone voluntad de ampliar relaciones de amistad con el PTC
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- El subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ryu Myong Son, quien participa en el XIV Congreso del Partido Comunista Sudafricano encabezando la delegacion del PTC, se reunio el dia 11 con el secretario general del CC de esa agrupacion sudafricana, Blade Nzimande.
					Blade Nzimande dijo que el Presidente del PTC y Maximo Dirigente del pueblo coreano, Kim Jong Un, envio personalmente una delegacion del PTC al XIV Congreso de su partido y este hecho significa gran fuerza y estimulo para la direccion y todos los militantes de su organizacion que sufre dificultades debido a las maniobras de los reaccionarios internos.
					
					Las relaciones entre ambos partidos tienen una larga tradicion historica, senalo y afirmo que su partido ampliara y desarrollara en el futuro las relaciones de amistad con el PTC.

articles.title: La RPDC celebra Dia de Mar
articles.content:
La RPDC celebra Dia de Mar
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Hoy es el Dia de Mar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Con motivo de este dia se desarrollan en diferentes localidades del pais las presentaciones y exposiciones de ciencias y tecnicas maritimas, las labores de divulgacion de conocimientos sobre la ciencia oceanografica, los encuentros de cine alusivo a la expedicion y desarrollo maritimos, la recoleccion y proteccion de animales y plantas maritimos y otras actividades.
					
					El reportero de la ACNC se entrevisto con el secretario general de la Asociacion de Oceanografia de Corea, Kwak Il Hwan, quien subrayo como sigue:
					
					Corea es rodeada de los mares por tres lados.
					
					En los mares que forman importante parte del territorio coreano abundan los recursos de animales y plantas, minerales, quimicos, energeticos, etc.
					
					La rama oceanografica cumple un rol importante en el desarrollo de la economia nacional. El desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas oceanograficas y la explotacion y uso activos de los recursos maritimos tienen gran importancia en enriquecer al pais y mejorar las condiciones de vida del pueblo.
					
					En el pais hay muchas modernas bases de investigacion de ciencias oceanograficas y los organos de ensenanza y estan acondicionadas las firmes bases necesarias para desarrollar mas las actividades de industria maritima.
					
					Con motivo del Dia de Mar se dinamizan las actividades deportivas maritimas y culturales, para que todos cuiden y sepan el mar.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se burla de chisme de Trump sobre la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se burla de chisme de Trump sobre la RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Trump dijo que Estados Unidos "enfrenta con la amenaza del poder imprudente y cruel" y hace falta la "contramedida decisiva".
					Pronuncio palabras contradictorias como que EE.UU. no reconocera jamas el arma nuclear del Norte de Corea ni su amenaza. Continuo que lo que ellos deben hacer es preparar con esmero todas las opciones, inclusive el uso de la fuerza.
					
					Lo tragico del caso es que Trump esta empantanado todavia en la "teoria de omnipotencia de la fuerza" que no surte ningun efecto en el caso de la RPDC.
					
					Asi ironiza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 12 y prosigue:
					
					Poner de rodillas a la RPDC con la presion militar y la campana de sancion y bloqueo es un sueno nunca realizable.
					
					Hasta la fecha, el pueblo coreano vivio sin conocer la frustracion ni el pesimismo aunque nunca estuvo fuera del chantaje militar y la sancion de EE.UU. 
					
					Creo los milagros del siglo tomando el autofortalecimiento como gran fuerza motriz y viene marchando en la recta hacia la construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Al paralelo de la escalada de chantaje militar, sancion y bloqueo de EE.UU., crecio la velocidad de avance de nuestra patria y se hizo mas fuerte nuestro pueblo.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos no daran ni un paso atras de su senda de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.
					
					La RPDC, digna potencia nuclear, defendera fidedignamente la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: ACNC comenta aventurera opcion militar de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta aventurera opcion militar de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. anuncia ruidosamente que ha preparado el plan de ataque militar anti-Norte segun la indicacion de Trump.
					El mismo mandatario norteamericano no oculta el intento de ataque militar diciendo que "ya termino la epoca de paciencia estrategica sobre el Norte (de Corea)" y que "tiene un plan muy fuerte y firme contra el".
					
					Muy asustado por el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14" de la RPDC, EE.UU. libro la llamada demostracion conjunta de misiles balisticos con los belicistas surcoreanos y el ejercicio de tiro de combate de los bombarderos nucleares B-1B trasladados otra vez al cielo de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Por otra parte, aprobo oficialmente el cambio del tubo de lanzamiento de misil crucero Tomahawk del submarino nuclear de clase Virginia, importante arma estrategica para el ataque anti-RPDC, con el objetivo de ampliar mas de 3 veces su capacidad de ataque terrestre.
					
					Esto deviene la accion agonica de EE.UU. que cogio tremendo miedo al inagotable poderio estatal y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC situada en la nueva altura.
					
					Y comprueba que las maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC de la actual administracion norteamericana llegan a una fase muy peligrosa.
					
					La administracion Trump, que decia que habia sido descartada la opcion militar de la politica de "maxima presion y compromiso", reclama abiertamente el golpe militar, lo cual demuestra que EE.UU. intenta realizar a toda costa la ambicion de desatar la guerra anti-RPDC con el ataque preventivo y sorpresivo.
					
					EE.UU. insiste ahora en que la RPDC ya sobrepaso la supuesta "linea roja", pero quien lo hizo realmente fue el mismo.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan dispuestos a hacer frente a la imprudente opcion militar de EE.UU.
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene preparado el plan de ataque militar anti-RPDC, esta tambien tiene el otro de fuerte reaccion militar al estilo coreano, el de operacion para exterminar el territorio norteamericano.
					
					La apuesta de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. adelantara solo el peor desastre de su historia, o sea, la devastacion del territorio estadounidense.
					
					Desde el momento en que se ponga en practica el plan de ataque militar anti-RPDC, se tornara tragico el destino de EE.UU.
					
					Es muy ridiculo el comportamiento de las autoridades surcoreanas que tratan de ocultar el siniestro intento de ataque preventivo de su amo gringo con las expresiones como "dialogo" y "papel protagonico".
					
					Seria bueno a la actual administracion norteamericana que se porte con seriedad escuchando la voz de la sociedad internacional de que "el ataque preventivo anti-RPDC no es una opcion real" y "es necesario corregir la postura histerica sobre la RPDC".
